TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class MenuItemCollection : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemCollection Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class MenuItemCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type MenuItemCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 控件中菜单项的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of menu items in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理一系列中的对象控件。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控件使用中的类来存储其根菜单项属性。The control uses the class to store its root menu items in the property. 此集合还用于属性的对象来存储菜单项的子菜单项 （如果有）。This collection is also used for the property of a object to store a menu item's submenu items (if any). 类支持采用多种方式来访问集合中的项：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用索引器直接检索特定的从零开始索引处的对象。Use the indexer to directly retrieve a object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法来创建可用于循环访问集合的枚举器。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法将集合的内容复制到一个数组。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an array. 你可以以编程方式管理通过添加和删除对象对象。You can programmatically manage a object by adding and removing objects. 若要向集合添加菜单项，请使用或方法。To add menu items to the collection, use the or the method. 若要从集合中删除节点，请使用，则，或方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , the , or the method. > [!NOTE] > 当控件绑定到数据源和集合会自动填充每次出现时绑定。When the control is bound to a data source, the and collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs. 对之间的绑定集合的任何更改都将丢失。Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost. 若要保留这些更改，请更新数据源或手动重新生成每次您将绑定的集合。To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind. 类包含属性和方法，可用于检索有关集合本身的信息。The class contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要确定集合中有多少项，使用属性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果你想要确定集合是否包含特定对象，请使用方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要获取的索引对象在集合中，使用方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何填充和集合使用声明性语法。The following code example demonstrates how to populate the and collections using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/CS/menudeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/VB/menudeclarativevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加对象传递给根菜单项的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a object to the collection of a root menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionAdd/CS/menuitemcollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionAdd/VB/menuitemcollectionaddvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类使用默认值。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the default values. 此构造函数通常用于创建菜单项集合的根不需要父菜单 （或所有者）。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root menu items where a parent menu (or owner) is not required. > [!NOTE] > 创建集合时的子菜单项，应使用重载的构造函数采用`owner`参数，而不是此构造函数，以指定的父菜单项。When creating a collection of child menu items, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent menu item. 扩展时，主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数控件来初始化属性。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when extending the control to initialize the property.

summary.span: 使用指定的父菜单项（或所有者）初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified parent menu item (or owner).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类使用指定的父菜单项 （或所有者）。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the specified parent menu item (or owner). 需要指定的父菜单项，此构造函数通常使用创建的子菜单项集合时。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of child menu items where you need to specify the parent menu item. > [!NOTE] > 创建集合时的根菜单项，请考虑使用默认构造函数，因为根菜单项不具有父菜单项。When creating a collection of root menu items, consider using the default constructor because root menu items do not have a parent menu item. 扩展时，主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数类来初始化属性。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when extending the class to initialize the property.

returns.span: 可用来循环访问当前 中的项的枚举数。

span.span: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the items in the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来创建一个可以轻松地循环访问当前中获取每个项的枚举器对象。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the current object. 若要获取当前指向的枚举器中的项，请使用属性。To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the property. 使用方法移动到下一项。Use the method to move to the next item. 如果你需要将枚举数移回集合的开头，则使用方法。If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 创建一个枚举器或使用后方法时，必须调用方法。After you create an enumerator or use the method, you must call the method. 否则，该项表示未定义属性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. 或者，还可以使用方法以将项复制到一个数组，集合中。As an alternative, you can also use the method to copy the items in the collection to an array. 然后可以使用数组来访问集合中的项。You can then use the array to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来创建包含的子菜单项的枚举数`Music`中的菜单项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an enumerator that contains the submenu items of the `Music` menu item in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionGetEnumerator/CS/menuitemcollectiongetenumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionGetEnumerator/VB/menuitemcollectiongetenumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Removes the specified object from the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法从集合中移除指定的菜单项。Use the method to remove the specified menu item from the collection. 然后按照该菜单项的所有项都将上都移以填充空白位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 已移动的项的索引也会更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 对象可以包含 null 值，以及重复对象。The object can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 或者，您可以删除菜单项从集合中特定索引使用方法。As an alternative, you can remove a menu item from a specific index in the collection by using the method. 您还可以删除所有菜单项集合中使用方法。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以编程方式移除对象从对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically remove a object from a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemove/CS/menuitemcollectionremovecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemove/VB/menuitemcollectionremovevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从当前 对象中移除指定索引位置的 对象。

span.span: Removes the object at the specified index location from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来删除对象从集合中指定的索引位置。Use the method to remove the object at the specified index location from the collection. 然后按照该菜单项的所有项都将上都移以填充空白位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 已移动的项的索引也会更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 对象可以包含 null 值，以及重复对象。The object can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 或者，可以删除特定对象使用方法。As an alternative, you can remove a specific object by using the method. 您还可以删除所有菜单项集合中使用方法。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以编程方式移除对象从对象中指定的索引位置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically remove a object from a object at a specified index location. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt/CS/menuitemcollectionremoveatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt/VB/menuitemcollectionremoveatvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 一个可用于同步对 的访问的 。

span.span: An that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的同步的版本可用于同步 （线程） 代码的对象。The property provides a synchronized version of the object that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code. > [!CAUTION] > 属性的类始终返回`false`，这指示类同步 （非线程安全）。The property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the class is not synchronized (not thread safe). 同步代码必须对执行操作的对象集合，不是直接在对象本身。Synchronizing code must perform operations on the object of the collection, not directly on the object itself. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它维护与其他线程可能同时对修改的正确同步对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. > [!NOTE] > 在此实现中返回的对象是对象用于存储集合中的对象。The object returned in this implementation is the object used to store the objects in the collection. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，从而使枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, causing the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 有关详细信息属性，请参阅属性的接口。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

span.span: Instructs the object to track changes to its view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的服务器控件上调用此方法后属性返回`true`。After this method has been called on a server control, the property returns `true`.
